name: Pisces Has Fallen
description:
RELEASE DATE: 18 October 2021

"Typhon, a winged monster with the head of a human and snake coils below, who breathed fire, caused huge storms and mass destruction, was sent down from Mount Olympus, by his mother, Gaia, Mother Earth, to wage war upon all the Greek gods.

The gods were forewarned of the arrival of Typhon, by the god Pan, who transformed himself into a seagoat, dived into the River Euphrates and escaped.

All the other gods, except Aphrodite (Venus), and her son, Eros (Cupid), who were out walking together along the banks of the River, followed suit, changed themselves into animals, in order to gain speed, and ran away to safety.

Seeing the plight of Aphrodite and Eros, Zeus, king of all Greek gods, turned them into fish, tied them together, so they would not be parted from one another, threw them into the river, where they swam away to freedom.

Aphrodite and Eros, are rewarded for their bravery by being placed in the sky by the Goddess Athena, as the constellation of Pisces."

"Pisces has Fallen"

Pisces, the UFO, has sustained some damage during its flight through the asteroid belt of Saturn. It sets a crash course to the nearest ocean on Earth.  Aphrodite (a fish alien/ the player) is searching for her son, Eros (obviously also a fish alien) on the damaged ship. They got separated during the collision. To make matters worse humans have noticed the UFO's landing and are making plans to investigate. 

                                    

HOW TO PLAY?
  • MOVEMENT - WASD
  • RUN - LEFT SHIFT
  • JUMP - SPACE
  • ACTION - LEFT MOUSE
  • INVENTORY - TAB
  • PAUSE MENU - ESC
CREDITS:

Thank you to all the artists who made this game possible.

TO THE PLAYER ...

Thank you for playing my game. I hope you enjoy it!

Lots of fishy sci-fi love ...

Rona Hattingh
